history.content: If they allow lecture conflicts then that means lectures will most likely be recorded. However, I would check with the professor about exam conflicts, because in general professors are not obligated to provide alternate exams due to schedule constraints.

If they allow lecture conflicts then that means lectures will most likely be recorded. However, I would check with the professor about exam conflicts, because in general professors are not obligated to provide alternate exams due to schedule constraints.

children.subject: As far as I know, 61C lectures will be recorded, and will offer alternate exam times. I can't make any promises because the final decision is up to the instructors, but that's what we've done this semester.

history.content:
Hello!

I have a question regarding the time conflict between cs 61c and my other class.

In the academic guide I read that cs 61c does allow time conflict.

Just to make sure, will the lectures of the 61c be recorded (because I have a lecture of another class which does not allow time conflicts)?

Also, the final exam of both classes are on the same day/time. As cs 61c allows time conflicts, will it also provide an alternate exam time in case of the situations like this one?

thanks in advance
history.subject: CS 61C time conflict
